7 #include <pses_ucbridge/Communication/threaddispatcher.h>

9 ThreadDispatcher::ThreadDispatcher(const std::shared_ptr<Syntax>& syntax)
10 {
11  this->syntax = syntax;
12  commandResponse = std::queue<std::string>();
13  sensorGroupMessage = std::queue<std::string>();
14  wakeUpCommunication = false;
15  debugMsgEnabled = false;
16  rawCommunicationEnabled = false;
17  errorCBregistered = false;
18  textCBregistered = false;
19 }
20 
21 void ThreadDispatcher::startThread()
22 {
23  active = true;
24  worker = std::thread(&ThreadDispatcher::workerFunction, this);
25  sensorGroupThread->startThread();
26  readingThread->startThread();
27 
28 }
29 
30 void ThreadDispatcher::stopThread()
31 {
32  readingThread->stopThread();
33  sensorGroupThread->stopThread();
34  active = false;
35  wakeUp();
36  worker.join();
37 }
38 
39 void ThreadDispatcher::enableDebugMessages(debugCallbackPtr debug)
40 {
41  this->debug = debug;
42  debugMsgEnabled = true;
43 }
44 
45 void ThreadDispatcher::enableRawCommunication()
46 {
47  rawCommunicationEnabled = true;
48 }
49 
50 void ThreadDispatcher::workerFunction()
51 {
52  while (active)
53  {
54  sleep();
55  while (!readingThread->isQueueEmpty() && active)
56  {
57  std::string data = readingThread->getData();
58  // in case of empty string
59  if (data.size() < 1)
60  continue;
61  if (debugMsgEnabled)
62  debug(data);
63  if (rawCommunicationEnabled)
64  {
65  continue;
66  }
67  // check for known prefixes
68  if (data.find(syntax->cmdErrorPrefix) == 0)
69  {
70  if (errorCBregistered)
71  error("UC board reported the following command error:\n"+data);
72  }
73  else if (data.find(syntax->genErrorPrefix) == 0)
74  {
75  if (errorCBregistered)
76  error("UC board reported the following error:\n"+data);
77  }
78  else if (data.find(syntax->textMsgPrefix) == 0)
79  {
80  if (textCBregistered)
81  text(data);
82  }
83  else if (data.find(syntax->channelGrpMsgPrefix) == 0)
84  {
85  sensorGroupMessage.push(data);
86  sensorGroupThread->wakeUp();
87  }
88  else if (data.find(syntax->answerOnCmdPrefix) == 0)
89  {
90  commandResponse.push(data);
91  if (wakeUpCommunication)
92  {
93  comCV->notify_one();
94  wakeUpCommunication = false;
95  }
96  }
97  }
98  }
99 }
100 
101 void ThreadDispatcher::setReadingThread(ReadingThread* rxThread)
102 {
103  if (!active)
104  {
105  this->readingThread = rxThread;
106  }
107 }

119  this->comCV = condVar;

122 void ThreadDispatcher::registerErrorCallback(debugCallbackPtr error)
123 {
124  this->error = error;
125  errorCBregistered = true;
126  sensorGroupThread->registerErrorCallback(error);
127  readingThread->registerErrorCallback(error);
128 
129 }
130 void ThreadDispatcher::registerTextCallback(debugCallbackPtr text)
131 {
132  this->text = text;

136 void ThreadDispatcher::dequeueResponse(std::string& response)
137 {
138  response = commandResponse.front();
139  commandResponse.pop();
140 }
141 
142 void ThreadDispatcher::dequeueSensorGroupMessage(std::string& response)
143 {
144  response = sensorGroupMessage.front();
145  sensorGroupMessage.pop();
146 }
147 
148 const bool ThreadDispatcher::IsResponseQueueEmpty() const
149 {
150  return commandResponse.empty();
151 }
152 
153 const bool ThreadDispatcher::IsMessageQueueEmpty() const
154 {
155  return sensorGroupMessage.empty();
156 }
